description:
At long last, the end of the first semester has come, but that just means an even greater challenge: final exams. Things take a strange turn when it appears there is no examiner. Is this a trick to get the C-type students to let their guard down? But a shadowy figure appears with a familiar voice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ga Yondaka Shiranai ga, Daremo ga Minna Shitte Iru. Sono Na wa Kuzuhira!
I Don`t Know Who Called, But Everyone Knows. The Name Is Katsuhira!
Tu ne sais pas qui tu as appelé, mais tout le monde le sait. Son nom est Katsuhira !
誰が呼んだか知らないが, 誰もがみんな知っている. その名は葛平!
